name: 'Old' and 'New' Movies Quiz | Name the Movie | 10 Questions

questions.text: What 1957 movie is about the love of a dog?
questions.explanation:
Old Yeller.

	This classic drama tells the story of the love a 15 year old boy (played by Tommy Kirk) has for a stray dog and the eventual heart-breaking decision he is faced with.

questions.text: What 1971 movie co-starred Elaine May as an heiress to a large sum of money?
questions.explanation:
A New Leaf.

	Elaine May also directed this comedy which starred Walter Matthau, who portrayed a man plotting to marry her for her money and then murder her.

questions.text: In what 1943 movie would you find the characters Kitty Marlowe and Millie Drake?
questions.explanation:
Old Acquaintance.

	When Kitty Marlowe, played by Bette Davis becomes reaquainted with her friend Millie Drake (Miriam Hopkins) they become rival authors and bitter enemies. A remake of the movie was made in 1981 and called "Rich and Famous".

questions.text: What 1991 movie saw Wesley Snipes as drug lord Nino Brown?
questions.explanation:
New Jack City.

	Drug lord Nino Brown (Wesley Snipes) builds his empire and two cops (played by Ice-T and Judd Nelson) are out to bring him down. The directorial debut of Mario Van Peebles.

questions.text: What 1980 comedy has Chevy Chase play a kidnap victim who is set up to be the fall guy for a bank robbery?
questions.explanation:
Seems Like Old Times.

	This movie, adapted from Neil Simon's play, sees Chevy Chase play a divorced novelist who is framed by his abducters and arrested as a bank robber.  When he escapes he goes to his ex-wife (played by Goldie Hawn) for help.

questions.text: What 2000 Disney moved featured the voices of David Spade and John Goodman?
questions.explanation:
The Emperor's New Groove.

	David Spade supplied the voice of Kuzco, the not so nice Emperor who turns into a llama.  John Goodman was the voice of Pacha, the kind-hearted villager who befriends Kuzco.

questions.text: What 1958 Spencer Tracy movie was adapted from a novella by Ernest Hemingway?
questions.correct: The Old Man and The Sea
options: The Old Sea and The Man
questions.explanation:
The Old Man and The Sea.

	Spencer Tracy portrays a Cuban fisherman out to catch a big fish and encounters troubles at sea.

questions.text: What movie saw a character called Snake trying to save the President of the US?
questions.explanation:
Escape from New York.

	This 1981 action-packed movie had Kurt Russell playing Snake Plissken, a one-eyed mercenary working on Manhattan Island which was then a maximum security prison.  When Air Force One crashes in Manhattan, Snake tries to get the President (played by Donald Pleasance) out of New York City.   There was a sequel called "Escape from L.A." released in 1996.

questions.text: What 1993 movie saw the characters John Gustafson and Max Goldman as feuding neighbors?
questions.explanation:
Grumpy Old Men.

	This comedy starred Jack Lemmon (John Gustafson) and Walter Matthau (Max Goldman) as neighbors who had been feuding for years.  When a beautiful woman (played by Ann Margaret) moves into the neighborhood, they  both try to win her affection, which makes their rivalry even more intense.

questions.text: What 1992 movie saw the escapades of a young boy having the time of his life in a fancy hotel?
questions.correct: Home Alone 2: Lost in New York
questions.explanation:
Home Alone 2: Lost in New York.

	This sequel brought back Kevin McCallister (Macaulay Culkin) who once again gets left behind by his family.  Joe Pesci and Daniel Stern also reprised their roles as the duo out to get Kevin.
